attributes.title: AWFUL!!
attributes.review: This app it the ABSOLUTE WORST!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!! Opening the app I immediately saw a photo of a very scary, racist, and old man! Ahhhh!!! Looking through the content I could tell that everything said was extremely rude and hurtful! I was scared!!! SCARY APP!!

attributes.title: Don’t get this app
attributes.review: This app is literally disgusting, I was hoping to get to see what my president is up to but all I see is a big Cheeto in a suit saying racist stuff and being a pedo. Worst thing ever.

attributes.title: shameful app
attributes.review: I really didn’t like the vibes to it, it just felt like I was about to get possessed just by looking at the cover info on the app. Made me so uncomfortable 0/10. Do not get. 👎🏼

attributes.title: Prolly even an app
attributes.review: As soon as I opened it I was just so disappointed on see how this app could be so unwell made It’s was just slow and annoying

attributes.title: No no no
attributes.review: Absolutely HORRIBLE service. So glitchy. It actually hacked my phone and made my phone 10x slower than it normally is. This app deserves to be deleted from the app store IMMEDIATELY🤢🤢
